statements: SELECT * FROM payment_status WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, status FROM payment_status WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT amount, payment_date FROM payment_status ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT status, amount FROM payment_status WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT payment_id, update_date FROM payment_status WHERE UPDATE_DATE > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_status WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, status FROM payment_status WHERE status = 'Pending' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY update_date ASC
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment_status WHERE status = 'Success' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_id
SELECT payment_id, status FROM payment_status WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY status, payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_status WHERE status IN ('Failed','Pending') ORDER BY status, payment_date
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE status = 'processed';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, status FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payments WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND status = 'completed';
SELECT payment_id, updated_at, new_status FROM payment_updates WHERE updated_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT payment_id, updated_at, new_status FROM payment_updates JOIN payments ON payment_updates.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE payments.status = 'cancelled';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT status, amount FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment_logs;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status, timestamp FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT transaction_id, updated_status, processing_time FROM payment_updates WHERE updated_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY processing_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_message FROM payment_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payments WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT update_id, transaction_id, update_type FROM updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status, payment_date FROM payments WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.name AS customer_name, u.update_type FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN updates u ON t.transaction_id = u.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_status;
SELECT payment_id, status, amount FROM payment_status WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT payment_id, status, amount FROM payment_status ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, status, amount FROM payment_status WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, user_type FROM payment_users WHERE user_type='Admin';
SELECT * FROM payment_status WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT status, amount FROM payment_status WHERE status = 'Complete' ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT payment_id, update_datetime, update_description FROM payment_updates WHERE update_datetime >= '2022-01-01' AND update_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT payment_id, log_id, log_datetime FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_datetime < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY log_datetime DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM payment_users WHERE user_type = 'Admin';
